this oft-repeated line implies all Jewish voters are zionists, a lie. In fact the zionist candidate in Wentworth, who is given huge swathes of ABC airtime to revive his failed political ambitions and uses it to promote his zionist credentials, lost the seat twice.
anyone still amplifying the zionist view is too far gone. They can not come back. It would mean conceding their careers - and existence - are wedded to lying on behalf of genocidaires.
exactly (see reply in thread). I have never seen a journo question how Israel missed all intel on 6 Oct while repeating its super techno bro propaganda.

there is no real point to this, other than empty techno-boasting (after apparently missing all intel on 6 Oct). Israelis do not need a cover story for how they select targets. They bomb wherever they want, whenever they want. The west gives them unlimited access to killing machines and impunity.

AI but make it genocide.
www.theguardian.com/world/2023/d...
police like power trips too.

they can and they do, with impunity. The only conclusion on the evidence - of trauma, of unlawfulness, of increasing risk of pre-loading etc - is that police keep strip searching children because like strip searching children.

police minister: police can not search someone just because a drug dog indicates.
Fact: yes, they can. Who is going to stop them? Police know most dog indications are false and nothing is found.

what the minister recites here - an approximation of the letter of the law - bears exactly no relation to what police actually do, with impunity. The EVIDENCE shows strip searches are traumatising; and that most dog-indications are both false and non-urgent - and therefore unlawful.

yet more evidence that police abuse of dogs to victimise mostly young people is traumatising, unlawful, and extremely expensive. Also police lie about the purpose, function and results of ab/using dogs to rationalise their violence.

carceral Chris Minns refuses redress and says there are well-established complaints processes for when police target, intimidate and criminalise children. There sure are. I made multiple lengthy complaints to Blacktown LAC and police responded with more targeted intimidation.

the police also claim they do not want to arrest their way out of this - where “this” is unlawfully criminalising children in violent harmful ways - and are working on a new version [of STMP] as we speak.

talk about burying the lede. The last sentence in this article says NSW Police have claimed they will end the STMP for adults as well - “by December”.

We talk about ‘Indigenous and non-Indigenous’ but as Indigenous is a classification not based on race, colour or geography but instead has to do with being colonised, it’d be better juxtaposed with terms like colonisers, migrants, immigrants and refugees. indigenousx.com.au/voice-debate...

with respect:

www.abc.net.au/news/2023-10...
there’s that metaphor reflex you mentioned😎

“Did you know that crows can bend pieces of metal to make a hook to get bits of meat out of test tubes?”

You can’t bring that same energy to talk about the views of Indigenous people on political issues and I shouldn’t have to fucking explain that.

“But I talked to a different Aboriginal person who had a different opinion and now I’m so confused!”

Do non-Indigenous people actually appreciate how dehumanising this is? It’s not like if you saw a dog reading a book or a polar bear that hates snow. We are different people with different opinions.
